plot: Terrance and Phillip must go to Iran to rescue Terrance's kidnapped daughter. Meanwhile Saddam Hussein takes over Canada.

In this Terrance and Phillip made-for-TV movie, Terrance receives word that his daughter Sally (whom he fathered with Celine Dion) has been kidnapped in Iran. They quickly find her in Iraq (not Iran) and head back home, only to learn that they've been lead on a wild goose chase orchestrated by their arch-enemy Scott, which has in turn allowed Saddam Hussein and his troops to flood into Canada. Realizing that Saddam has tricked him, Scott puts aside his differences with Terrance and Phillip to come up with a plan to get rid of the dictator for good.—Jean-Marc Rocher <rocher@fiberbit.net>

In this episode all about Terrance and Phillip. Scott makes a deal with Saddam Hussein. If Scott gets him and "friends" into Canada, Saddam will kill Terrance and Phillip. Terrance's daughter is kidnapped so the duo travels to Iraq to save her. Only to come back to find Saddam is planning to take over Canada. It's up to Terrance and Phillip to save Canada.—aaronkavo-1
